Parameters: String: the name of the calling package This value must never be null.

String: the type of widget e.g. @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_TEXTVIEW_E@ This value must never be null. Value is @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_TEXTVIEW_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_EDITTEXT_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_UNSELECTABLE_TEXTVIEW_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_WEBVIEW_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_EDIT_WEBVIEW_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_CUSTOM_TEXTVIEW_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_CUSTOM_EDITTEXT_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_CUSTOM_UNSELECTABLE_TEXTVIEW_E@, @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_NOTIFICATION_E@, or @B_android#view#textclassifier#TextClassifier#WIDGET_TYPE_UNKNOWN_E@
